name: EZ Mode
description:
EZ Mode is a game I made. That's about it.

Made in 14 days, thanks for even taking a look!

EZ-Mode includes 5 levels with a little extra for those who are willing to search...

Be sure to look everywhere and maybe you'll find everything!

There are many unique features & tricks hidden away in each level, be sure to try out everything!

NOTICE : Android build is unplayable on standard android devices, a key board will be needed to play in all versions, including android.
